Posts.Content: Oct 9, 2012 03:08PM mar994 wrote: Thanks so much for the feedback and information.  Beacon800, I haven't felt anything except for the pain in my underarm area.  I've noticed a swelling in my neck on the right side also, which hasn't gone away.  Sigh.  I will have a better idea Thursday morning.
Posts.Title: Scared, trying not to worry mar994 pupmom
Scared, trying not to worry mar994 pupmom

Posts.Content: mar994 wrote: I've had a pain under my right arm for a couple of months. At first, I thought it was all the time I was spending on the computer and cell phone. When the pain didn't go away, I thought I'd better go in for my mammogram. I didn't get my mammogram last spring. Well, I got a phone call this morning. They want me to come in for a diagnostic mammogram on my right breast. I'm scared to death that it's going to be cancer. I'm unemployed and looking for work, hence no insurance. My husband was unemployed for a while and just now went back to work. But his job doesn't offer insurance. I'm trying not to fall apart and know I shouldn't worry just yet. But, based on the pain I've been having, I'm fearing the worst. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Scared, trying not to worry mar994 pupmom
